Title: Relates to training requirements for police officers on the operation of police vehicles
Summary: Directs the municipal police training council to develop, and the commissioner of the division of criminal justice services to implement, certain training requirements for police officers on the operation of police vehicles, including a minimum of 40 hours of training for new police officers and 4 hours of training for police in-service training courses.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to training requirements for police officers on the operation of police vehicles
